body.p:
THE FEDERAL UNION IT MUST BE PRESERVED
Published by Mumford & Co., 38 and 40 W. 4th St., Cin'ti, O.

Mt. Eden Ky., July 19"/ 61
His Excellency, B. Magoffin
Govr. of Ky-
Sirs-
I herewith enclose my commission, as 1st Lieut. for the "Crittenden Greys" a company of State Guards belonging To The Shelby Battalion of the same. Tendering my resignation of the same.

Respectfully, &c. &c. &c.
Joseph R. Snider
1st Lieut of Crittenden Greys
Snider
accepted
B. Magoffin
